sendDirective

public void sendDirective(Directive dir,
                          java.util.Collection changes)
Reliably send a directive.

The message transport takes pains to retransmit this message until it is acknowledged, even if agents crash. When a crashed agent recovers, the blackboard invokes the RestartLogicProviders.

Specified by:
sendDirective in interface BlackboardServesDomain

Parameters:
